head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVERA, JEANNE MOORE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVERA, JEANNE MOORE

block.p: RIVERA--Jeanne Moore, 76 of Eastchester, on January 25th, 2007. Survived by daughters Cynthia DeBruin and Carol Selvey, sisters Katherine and Marianne, and cousin Thomas S. Hogan. Visitation at Westchester Funeral Home, Inc., Eastchester, Saturday, January 27th, 1-5pm. Memorial service at Scarsdale Congregational Church, UCC, Sunday, January 28th, 2:30pm. Contributions suggested to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, Hospice Care in Westchester and Putnam, or Save The Children. To sign our online guest book visit: www.westchesterfuneralhome.com
